msbt.message: Hey, did you forget about me the other day, ?I came by calling for you, but you weren't there. It's alrightâ€”I just went home and did lunges all day.
Hey, I know we were supposed to hang out, butI forgot I was running a marathon. I'm really sorry! I'll make it up to you. I promise, .
Sorry, ! I know I promised to swing by your place, but I totally spaced.I was doing push-ups, I had a good rhythm going, and I just lost track of timeI'm going to make it up to you, .
